reference.title: Basic Terms for GIF and PNG
reference.shortdesc: Some basic terms involved in the compression of GIF and PNG files.

strow.stentry: a lossless data compression algorithm that was first published by Terry Welch in 1984 as a modification of the LZ77 and LZ78 compression algorithms developed by Jacob Ziv and Abraham Lempel
Lossless Data Compression/stentry> data compression algorithm where original data can be perfectly reconstructed from the compressed data
type of lossless data compression algorithms that enable a table/ dictionary to encode and decode files.
a dictionary developed by scanning a text for repeated letters and letter strings and giving them a corresponding "dictionary" entry of bits/
